items.sentence: Doing that was more difficult than I thought it'd be.
It's been three years since I've had a real vacation.
Tom is the only one in our family that likes to swim.
Tom put new pedals on the bicycle he rides to school.
I think that you and I'd better have a talk with Tom.
Tom is going to Boston to spend a few days with Mary.
Tom wanted Mary to tell him why she did what she did.
Tom and Mary have spent most of their lives together.
Tom didn't know what Mary was hiding behind her back.
Even though he's a policeman, he's afraid of thieves.
